fullText: Cicely Tyson gives a towering performance as an elderly woman yearning to return to her childhood home in this revival of Horton Foote's tender drama.
dtliExcerpt: Cicely Tyson gives a towering performance as an elderly woman yearning to return to her childhood home in this revival of Horton Foote's tender drama.
